Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Division
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses rrted SB: Clark, Maple, and State; NB: State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/Division.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Maple, and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-Ashland-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-Ashalnd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following a earlier sick customer at 35th-Bronzeville. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-Ashalnd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 35th-Bronzeville.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
